name: runny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
more liquid than usual: The sauce looked runny so I added some more flour. Compare
liquid adjective (SUBSTANCE)
thin adjective (FLOWING EASILY)
If your nose is runny, it is producing more mucus than usual, usually because you are ill: I've got a runny nose.
